snippet: Are the Giants, who had strong performances from all three units against Dallas, playing their best football of the season as they prepare to face the Atlanta Falcons?
abstract: Are the Giants, who had strong performances from all three units against Dallas, playing their best football of the season as they prepare to face the Atlanta Falcons?
lead_paragraph: A capsule look at the Giants' 31-14 victory over Dallas to clinch the N.F.C. East and a playoff berth:
